# configuration

**Instance Property**

The configuration run by the session.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var configuration: NIConfiguration? { get }
```

## Discussion

An app doesn’t set this property. Instead, NI sets its value to reflect the object that the app passed in to [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISession/run(_:)].

## Connecting to A Peer Device

- **discoveryToken**: A temporary, random identifier for a device.
- **NIDiscoveryToken**: An object that uniquely identifies a peer that participates in an interaction session.
- **run(_:)**: Starts a session with a nearby peer.
- **delegateQueue**: The dispatch queue on which the session invokes delegate callbacks.
